short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that displays a random mindfulness activity at selected intervals to remind you to stay present.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Imagine transforming your regular browsing time into a journey of mindfulness and presence. Introducing a Chrome extension that does just that! This nifty tool sends you delightful little reminders at intervals you choose, nudging you to indulge in quick, rejuvenating mindfulness activities. Whether it's taking a deep breath, appreciating the world around you, or a swift stretch â€“ these activities are designed to take no more than 10 minutes of your time. Perfect for those who find themselves lost in the digital realm for hours, this extension becomes your friendly guide, gently reminding you to anchor yourself in the present. Dive into a world where your browser not only connects you to the internet but also reconnects you with yourself. Stay present, stay mindful, and let your browser be the bridge to a more centered you.
